title: Farmers' Guide to High-quality Seed Production

tasks.task: Ride a tractor through a field to plant crops} \\
subtasks: Operate the steering wheel to navigate the tractor through the field} \\
Engage the tractor's transmission to move forward} \\
Adjust the planter settings based on crop type} \\
Release seeds into the ground as the tractor moves forward} \\
Ensure proper depth and spacing of seeds in the soil} \\

tasks.task: Monitor and adjust equipment during operation} \\
subtasks: Make any necessary adjustments to the equipment while moving} \\

tasks.task: Ride a tractor through a field to plant crops. Then, within that, there are subtasks: sitting on the seat, operating the steering wheel to navigate, and engaging the transmission. That makes sense because you need to steer the tractor to go through the field and use the transmission to move.
Ride a tractor through a field to plant crops
subtasks: Operate the steering wheel to navigate the tractor through the field**
Engage the tractor's transmission to move forward**
Adjust the planter settings based on crop type**
Release seeds into the ground as the tractor moves forward**
Ensure proper depth and spacing of seeds in the soil**

tasks.task: Monitor and adjust equipment during operation
subtasks: Make any necessary adjustments to the equipment while moving**
